# 2. Gapminder Barplot

```{r}
#load the gapminder dataset
library(gapminder)
data("gapminder")
```


```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x=continent, fill=continent)) + 
    geom_bar(aes(y=..count../12)) +
    labs(y="Number of countries") +
    guides(fill=FALSE) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#533A71", "#6184D8", "#50C5B7", "#9CEC5B", "#F0F465")) + 
  theme_bw() +
  coord_flip()
```
